text: @SpeakerPelosi I really hope the #COVID19 #coronavirus doesn’t become a #PoliticalFootball. It’s a #MedicalNightmare having all kinds of effects on the #AmericanPeople. This horror #DeservesRespect for how it has already ravaged us all. Even with the errors we do not need #Politicization of it.
